pullrequest.title: First pass at gflags command line argument parsing

content.raw:
Thanks for the PR, @adam_allevato !

I'm trying to build it this way:

~~~
mkdir build
cd build
cmake ..
~~~

And I get this error:

~~~
CMake Error: File /Config.hh.in does not exist.
CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:20 (configure_file):
  configure_file Problem configuring file
~~~

Am I missing something?
